{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06184v1", "title": "The two-loop Higgs impact factor", "summary": "In the HEFT, we consider the Regge limit of the two-loop amplitudes for Higgs
boson production in association with a jet, expanded to NNLL accuracy. We
discuss the issue of the Regge cuts versus poles in this context, and determine
for the first time the Higgs impact factor at two-loop accuracy.", "main_category": "hep-ph", "categories": "hep-ph", "published": "2025-04-08T16:24:57Z"}
